import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';

# Create prealert
 Creates a prealert for the order list



`Function CreatePrealert(Val Token, Val UUIDArray, Val TransferDate, Val Point, Val TestAPI = False) Export`

  | Parameter | CLI option | Type | Required | Description |
  |-|-|-|-|-|
  | Token | --token | String | &#x2714; | Auth token |
  | UUIDArray | --uuids | String, Array of String | &#x2714; | One or an array of order UUIDs |
  | TransferDate | --date | Date | &#x2714; | Planned date of transfer of orders to CDEK |
  | Point | --point | String | &#x2714; | Code of shipment point to which it is planned to transfer orders |
  | TestAPI | --testapi | Boolean | &#x2716; | Flag to use test API for requests |

  
  Returns:  Map Of KeyAndValue - serialized JSON response from CDEK

<br/>

:::tip
Method at API documentation: [Registration of Prealert document](https://api-docs.cdek.ru/78935159.html)
:::
<br/>


```bsl title="1C:Enterprise/OneScript code example"
    Token        = "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9....";
    UUID         = "bc7bd3f0-5fdd-494d-a531-25cf85f66513";
    Point        = "NSK27";
    TransferDate = OPI_Tools.GetCurrentDate() + 60 * 60 * 24;

    Result = OPI_CDEK.CreatePrealert(Token, UUID, TransferDate, Point, True);
```
 

 <Tabs>
  
    <TabItem value="bash" label="Bash" default>
        ```bash
            oint cdek CreatePrealert \
 --token "***" \
 --uuids "0a26a2dd-8332-4c30-a4ff-c1b70aa14698" \
 --date "2024-10-21T22:14:45.1691361" \
 --p            oint "NSK27" \
 --testapi "***"
        ```
    </TabItem>
  
    <TabItem value="bat" label="CMD/Bat" default>
        ```batch
            oint cdek CreatePrealert ^
 --token "***" ^
 --uuids "0a26a2dd-8332-4c30-a4ff-c1b70aa14698" ^
 --date "2024-10-21T22:14:45.1691361" ^
 --p            oint "NSK27" ^
 --testapi "***"
        ```
    </TabItem>
</Tabs>
